00007 #include <math.h>
00008 #include <stdio.h>
00009 #include <GLES2/gl2.h>

00011 #include <string>

00013 namespace {

00015 GLuint g_texture = 0;
00016 int g_textureLoc = -1;
00017 GLuint g_programObject = 0;
00018 GLuint g_worldMatrixLoc = 0;
00019 GLuint g_vbo = 0;
00020 GLsizei g_texCoordOffset = 0;
00021 int g_angle = 0;
00022 
00023 void CheckGLError(const char* func_name, int line_no) {
00024 #ifndef NDEBUG
00025   GLenum error = GL_NO_ERROR;
00026   while ((error = glGetError()) != GL_NO_ERROR) {
00027     printf("GL Error in %s at line %d: 0x%4x\n",
00028         func_name, line_no, error);
00029   }
00030 #endif
00031 }
00032 
00033 GLuint LoadShader(GLenum type, const char* shaderSrc) {
00034   CheckGLError("LoadShader", __LINE__);
00035   GLuint shader = glCreateShader(type);
00036   if (shader == 0) {
00037     return 0;
00038   }
00039   // Load the shader source
00040   glShaderSource(shader, 1, &shaderSrc, NULL);
00041   // Compile the shader
00042   glCompileShader(shader);
00043   // Check the compile status
00044   GLint value;
00045   glGetShaderiv(shader, GL_COMPILE_STATUS, &value);
00046   if (value == 0) {
00047     char buffer[1024];
00048     GLsizei length = 0;
00049     glGetShaderInfoLog(shader, sizeof(buffer), &length, buffer);
00050     std::string log(buffer, length);
00051     printf("Error compiling shader: %s\n", log.c_str());
00052     glDeleteShader(shader);
00053     return 0;
00054   }
00055   return shader;
00056 }
00057 
00058 void InitShaders() {
00059   static const char* vShaderStr =
00060     "uniform mat4 worldMatrix;\n"
00061     "attribute vec3 g_Position;\n"
00062     "attribute vec2 g_TexCoord0;\n"
00063     "varying vec2 texCoord;\n"
00064     "void main()\n"
00065     "{\n"
00066     "   gl_Position = worldMatrix *\n"
00067     "                 vec4(g_Position.x, g_Position.y, g_Position.z, 1.0);\n"
00068     "   texCoord = g_TexCoord0;\n"
00069     "}\n";
00070   static const char* fShaderStr =
00071     "precision mediump float;\n"
00072     "uniform sampler2D tex;\n"
00073     "varying vec2 texCoord;\n"
00074     "void main()\n"
00075     "{\n"
00076     "  gl_FragColor = texture2D(tex, texCoord);\n"
00077     "}\n";
00078 
00079   CheckGLError("InitShaders", __LINE__);
00080   GLuint vertexShader = LoadShader(GL_VERTEX_SHADER, vShaderStr);
00081   GLuint fragmentShader = LoadShader(GL_FRAGMENT_SHADER, fShaderStr);
00082   // Create the program object
00083   GLuint programObject = glCreateProgram();
00084   if (programObject == 0) {
00085     printf("Creating program failed\n");
00086     return;
00087   }
00088   glAttachShader(programObject, vertexShader);
00089   glAttachShader(programObject, fragmentShader);
00090   // Bind g_Position to attribute 0
00091   // Bind g_TexCoord0 to attribute 1
00092   glBindAttribLocation(programObject, 0, "g_Position");
00093   glBindAttribLocation(programObject, 1, "g_TexCoord0");
00094   // Link the program
00095   glLinkProgram(programObject);
00096   // Check the link status
00097   GLint linked;
00098   glGetProgramiv(programObject, GL_LINK_STATUS, &linked);
00099   if (linked == 0) {
00100     char buffer[1024];
00101     GLsizei length = 0;
00102     glGetProgramInfoLog(programObject, sizeof(buffer), &length, buffer);
00103     std::string log(buffer, length);
00104     printf("Error linking program: %s\n", log.c_str());
00105     glDeleteProgram(programObject);
00106     return;
00107   }
00108   g_programObject = programObject;
00109   g_worldMatrixLoc = glGetUniformLocation(g_programObject, "worldMatrix");
00110   g_textureLoc = glGetUniformLocation(g_programObject, "tex");
00111   glGenBuffers(1, &g_vbo);
00112   glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, g_vbo);
00113   static float vertices[] = {
00114       0.25,  0.75, 0.0,
00115      -0.75,  0.75, 0.0,
00116      -0.75, -0.25, 0.0,
00117       0.25,  0.75, 0.0,
00118      -0.75, -0.25, 0.0,
00119       0.25, -0.25, 0.0,
00120   };
00121   static float texCoords[] = {
00122     1.0, 1.0,
00123     0.0, 1.0,
00124     0.0, 0.0,
00125     1.0, 1.0,
00126     0.0, 0.0,
00127     1.0, 0.0,
00128   };
00129   g_texCoordOffset = sizeof(vertices);
00130   glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER,
00131                sizeof(vertices) + sizeof(texCoords),
00132                NULL,
00133                GL_STATIC_DRAW);
00134   glBufferSubData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0, sizeof(vertices), vertices);
00135   glBufferSubData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, g_texCoordOffset,
00136                   sizeof(texCoords), texCoords);
00137   CheckGLError("InitShaders", __LINE__);
00138 }
00139 
00140 GLuint CreateCheckerboardTexture() {
00141   CheckGLError("CreateCheckerboardTexture", __LINE__);
00142   static unsigned char pixels[] = {
00143     255, 255, 255,
00144     0,   0,   0,
00145     0,   0,   0,
00146     255, 255, 255,
00147   };
00148   GLuint texture;
00149   glGenTextures(1, &texture);
00150   glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, texture);
00151   glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
00152   glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
00153   glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
00154   glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
00155   glPixelStorei(GL_UNPACK_ALIGNMENT, 1);
00156   glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGB, 2, 2, 0, GL_RGB, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE,
00157                pixels);
00158   CheckGLError("CreateCheckerboardTexture", __LINE__);
00159   return texture;
00160 }
00161 
00162 }  // anonymous namespace.
00163 
00164 void GLFromCPPInit() {
00165   CheckGLError("GLFromCPPInit", __LINE__);
00166   glClearColor(0.f, 0.f, .7f, 1.f);
00167   g_texture = CreateCheckerboardTexture();
00168   InitShaders();
00169   CheckGLError("GLFromCPPInit", __LINE__);
00170 }
00171 
00172 void GLFromCPPDraw() {
00173   const float kPi = 3.1415926535897932384626433832795f;
00174 
00175   CheckGLError("GLFromCPPDraw", __LINE__);
00176   // TODO(kbr): base the angle on time rather than on ticks
00177   g_angle = (g_angle + 1) % 360;
00178   // Rotate about the Z axis
00179   GLfloat rot_matrix[16];
00180   GLfloat cos_angle = cosf(static_cast<GLfloat>(g_angle) * kPi / 180.0f);
00181   GLfloat sin_angle = sinf(static_cast<GLfloat>(g_angle) * kPi / 180.0f);
00182   // OpenGL matrices are column-major
00183   rot_matrix[0] = cos_angle;
00184   rot_matrix[1] = sin_angle;
00185   rot_matrix[2] = 0.0f;
00186   rot_matrix[3] = 0.0f;
00187 
00188   rot_matrix[4] = -sin_angle;
00189   rot_matrix[5] = cos_angle;
00190   rot_matrix[6] = 0.0f;
00191   rot_matrix[7] = 0.0f;
00192 
00193   rot_matrix[8] = 0.0f;
00194   rot_matrix[9] = 0.0f;
00195   rot_matrix[10] = 1.0f;
00196   rot_matrix[11] = 0.0f;
00197 
00198   rot_matrix[12] = 0.0f;
00199   rot_matrix[13] = 0.0f;
00200   rot_matrix[14] = 0.0f;
00201   rot_matrix[15] = 1.0f;
00202 
00203   // Note: the viewport is automatically set up to cover the entire Canvas.
00204   // Clear the color buffer
00205   glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT);
00206   CheckGLError("GLFromCPPDraw", __LINE__);
00207   // Use the program object
00208   glUseProgram(g_programObject);
00209   CheckGLError("GLFromCPPDraw", __LINE__);
00210   // Set up the model matrix
00211   glUniformMatrix4fv(g_worldMatrixLoc, 1, GL_FALSE, rot_matrix);
00212 
00213   // Load the vertex data
00214   glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, g_vbo);
00215   glEnableVertexAttribArray(0);
00216   glVertexAttribPointer(0, 3, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, 0, 0);
00217   glEnableVertexAttribArray(1);
00218   glVertexAttribPointer(1, 2, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, 0,
00219                         reinterpret_cast<const void*>(g_texCoordOffset));
00220   CheckGLError("GLFromCPPDraw", __LINE__);
00221   // Bind the texture to texture unit 0
00222   glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, g_texture);
00223   CheckGLError("GLFromCPPDraw", __LINE__);
00224   // Point the uniform sampler to texture unit 0
00225   glUniform1i(g_textureLoc, 0);
00226   CheckGLError("GLFromCPPDraw", __LINE__);
00227   glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLES, 0, 6);
00228   CheckGLError("GLFromCPPDraw", __LINE__);
00229   glFlush();
00230 }
